forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 55F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Thunder possible. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder possible. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the morning. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Low clouds and fog. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 64F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
